name: search_searchterm
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool uncovered_treasure.
Tool description: The Uncovered Treasure API has more than 25,000 revealed truths from every Book and chapter in the Bible as recorded by Phil Largent over the last 25 years.
API description: Search for a term using the Uncovered Treasure API and return the results.

searchterm.description: The term to search for, e.g., "God's plan".

callback.description: An optional JSONP callback parameter for the API request.
